name: Gingerbread House
steps: Bake 350 F 8 min. ( Gingerbread houses 12-­‐15 min.)
Beat egg whites and cream of tarter until it is white and foamy. Add sugar and beat forever until frosting is stiff.
Fold rectangle in half long ways and make a crease
Cut a rectangle the size of the above and curve the top to make the door. Center on the front of the house
Roll dough out and place on tin foil before cutting. The dough shrinks when you lift it up so you will have a better
fit if you put it on the foil. Place the pieces and the foil onto the cookie sheet and bake. Using a pizza cutter helps
